entry.title: My development stack
entry.content: Hi everyone! I’m going to talk a bit about how I work on the programming projects I’m involved with, and how I plan to continue working on GSoC. I hope this post helps you to improve your workflow, or at least to get to know me a bit better.

entry.title: Google Summer of Code 2024 participation
entry.content: This is the first post of a series that will be published in the coming weeks to talk about my participation in Google Summer of Code 2024.
